about_the_game:
Contents include:
- Jellal as a playable character
Allows players to add Heavenly Body Magician Jellal to their party as a playable character after Bonus Chapter 1.
- Character Story
Jellal's special story will be unlocked via character progression.
- A total of 3 outfits specific to Jellal
・ Jellal's outfit "Luxury Restaurant"
・ Jellal's outfit "Happy Wedding"
・ Jellal's outfit "Fairy School"

Note:
- The three outfits will be unlocked when Jellal is added to the player's party.
- Characters' outfits can be changed from the Characters screen. (The character must be a party member.)
- Content can be accessed after reaching a designated point in the game.
- Please see the official site for more details.
- This product is eligible content for the "FAIRY TAIL 2 Season Pass." Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
detailed_description:
Contents include:
- Jellal as a playable character
Allows players to add Heavenly Body Magician Jellal to their party as a playable character after Bonus Chapter 1.
- Character Story
Jellal's special story will be unlocked via character progression.
- A total of 3 outfits specific to Jellal
・ Jellal's outfit "Luxury Restaurant"
・ Jellal's outfit "Happy Wedding"
・ Jellal's outfit "Fairy School"

Note:
- The three outfits will be unlocked when Jellal is added to the player's party.
- Characters' outfits can be changed from the Characters screen. (The character must be a party member.)
- Content can be accessed after reaching a designated point in the game.
- Please see the official site for more details.
- This product is eligible content for the "FAIRY TAIL 2 Season Pass." Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
